report.title: Filterable occurrences count per user/website combination.
report.description: Return a count of occurrences the user has created on a given website. Report can be supplied a filter from the filters table.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE 1=1 AND o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.created_by_id=#user_id# AND #sharing_filter# #idlist#
